name: MemoryRetrievalAgent
description: This agent is responsible for retrieving relevant information from mem0's memory based on a given task or query. It reads a YAML configuration, initializes a Memory client (mem0), and then searches for relevant memory entries. Finally, it returns the matching results as output.

inputs.name: task
inputs.description: The query or instruction that the agent uses to search the mem0 memory.

outputs.name: memeory_retrieval_result
outputs.description: A list of strings (the retrieved memory entries) relevant to the input task or data.
